definition: poisoned milk/contaminated milk/refers to 2008 PRC scandal involving milk products adulterated with melamine 三聚氰胺[san1 ju4 qing2 an4]
poisoned milk powder/refers to 2008 PRC scandal involving milk powder adulterated with melamine 三聚氰胺[san1 ju4 qing2 an4]

sentences.english: Sanlu, no doubt, is just the tip of the iceberg.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，三鹿毒奶事件只是冰山一角。

definition: (Internet slang) to mouth off/to shoot one's mouth off/sb who does that
to win without needing to even lift a finger/victory presented on a platter
to hang sb up and beat him
(Internet slang) to attack verbally/to publicly criticize/to call out
member of same class, team, work group etc/teammate
(video games) PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds (PUBG)/battle royale game/last-man-standing game/to play PUBG (or similar game)/to win at PUBG (or similar game)
to make a comeback/(of a doctor's assessment of the gender of a fetus) to turn out to be wrong
to cheat in an online game (abbr. for 開外掛|开外挂[kai1 wai4 gua4])/(coll.) unbelievably good
big shot (leading some field or group)/godfather
